NAME.Nominative: Thursday of the Sixth Week of Lent
NAME.Short: Thursday of the Sixth Week of Lent

TROPARION.Header: Troparion of the Prophecy in the 1st Tone

SEXTE.TROPARION: Forget not the voice of Thy servants, O Lord; remember that at all times we have placed our hope in Thee, O Allpowerful One, and help us, we pray.

PROKEIMENON.Header: First Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: This is the gate of the Lord,
the righteous shall enter in thereat.
SEXTE.STICHOS: O give thanks unto the Lord, for He is good, for His mercy endureth for ever.

PROKEIMENON.Header: Second Prokeimenon of the Prophecy in the 4th Tone

SEXTE.PROKEIMENON: The way of Thy commandments have I run,
when Thou didst enlarge my heart.
SEXTE.STICHOS: Set before me for a law, O Lord, the way of Thy statutes.
